review: I've always valued my Amazon Prime membership--mostly for the free deliveries. I prefer to shop for everything from dog food to pantry staples to electronics through Amazon. It's so much more efficient for me. But, I was not utilizing my membership completely until now. I bought my Fire Stick with a gift card I received for Christmas. I guess they were inundated with orders from the holidays because it took a few weeks to arrive. But, it was so worth the wait!! This is the coolest thing EVER! I set it up yesterday. It was so easy. I did order an extension cord because of the way my TV is set up. But, I have been doing a Sopranos binge all day. Quality is awesome. Also watched Amazon's Transparent. Excellent streaming quality. I am considering cancelling my satellite subscription. This is way less expensive and it seems that I will never get through all of the titles provided by Amazon prime. BRAVO, Amazon!!!
